short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a profanity filter to StackOverflow and StackExchange chatrooms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a profanity filter to StackOverflow and StackExchange chatrooms.

The filter mode can be changed via an injected dropdown:

Blur - Blurs matches (reveals on :hover)
Replace - Replaces matches with !@#$%^&*
Remove - Completely removes matches
Ignore - Ignores profanity

Now features a configuration panel for maintaining your filtration patterns.
